# Enterprise CMMS System - Copilot Instructions

This is an enterprise-grade Maintenance Management System (CMMS) built with MERN stack.

## Key Features
- **Team Management**: Add/remove technicians, assign teams, manage roles
- **Equipment Tracking**: Complete equipment lifecycle management
- **Maintenance Workflows**: Preventive and corrective maintenance
- **Role-Based Access**: Admin, Technician, Employee with strict permissions
- **Odoo-Style UI**: Professional, minimalist interface

## Enhanced Requirements
- Team member CRUD operations (add/delete technicians)
- Dynamic team assignment capabilities
- Technician workload balancing
- Team performance analytics
- Skills-based team matching

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React + Vite + TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- Authentication: JWT with bcrypt
- State Management: Zustand
